item.source: How do i make a colourfull ::yell

item.title: How do i make a colourfull ::yell
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && !muted) { String text = command.substring(5); if((donator==1) && (playerRights<=0)){ yell("@blu@[@blu@Donator "+ playerName + "]:@red@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==1){ yell("@blu@[@blu@Mod "+ playerName + "]:@red@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==2){ yell("@blu@[@blu@Admin "+ playerName + "]:@red@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==3){ yell("@blu@[@blu@Super Admin "+ playerName + "]:@red@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==4){ yell("@blu@[@blu@Owner "+ playerName + "]:@red@ " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } }

Hope that helped, you may want to edit it, expand on it or whatever. Its for a deltabase, so may also need to be converted.

Read full topic
